name: toggle-adf-trigger
description: Start/stop an Azure Data Factory Trigger
author: Jan Pieter Posthuma

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown:
This is needed to connect to your Azure account.
To configure new service connection, select the Azure subscription from the list and click 'Authorize'.
If your subscription is not listed or if you want to use an existing Service Principal, you can setup an Azure service connection using 'Add' or 'Manage' button.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the resource group.

inputs.name: DatafactoryName
inputs.label: Azure Data Factory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Azure Data Factory.

inputs.name: TriggerFilter
inputs.label: Trigger Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Filter to determine which triggers to delete.
-Empty string: *none* triggers will be deleted.
-`*`: *all* triggers will be deleted.

inputs.name: Throttle
inputs.label: Number of parallel deployments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of parallel deployments, default is 5
